problem_text: Figure 22-37 shows two charged particles on an $x$ axis: $-q=$ $-3.20 \times 10^{-19} \mathrm{C}$ at $x=-3.00 \mathrm{~m}$ and $q=3.20 \times 10^{-19} \quad \mathrm{C}$ at $x=+3.00 \mathrm{~m}$. What is the magnitude of the net electric field produced at point $P$ at $y=4.00 \mathrm{~m}$ ?
